title: I Love The Way You Love Me
lyrics: I like the feel of your name on my lips And I like the sound of your sweet gentle kiss The way that your fingers run through my hair And how your scent l ingers even when y ou're not th ere And I like the way your eyes dance when you laugh And how you enjoy your two-hour bath And how you've convinced me to dance in the rain With everyone watching l ike we w ere in sane But I love the way you love me S trong and wild, s low and easy H eart and soul s o completely I love the way you love me
